snippet: A homeless man linked by DNA to the killing of Sarai Sierra was captured near the Turkish-Syrian border, officials said.
abstract: Turkish authorities say homeless man linked by DNA to the killing of Staten Island resident Sarai Sierra was captured near Turkish-Syrian border; Sierra was touring alone in Turkey when she disappeared; her bludgeoned body was later discovered by side of road in Istanbul.

byline.original: By SEBNEM ARSU and J. DAVID GOODMAN
byline.contributor: Sebnem Arsu reported from Istanbul, and J. David Goodman from New York

lead_paragraph: A homeless man linked by DNA to the killing of Sarai Sierra was captured near the Turkish-Syrian border, officials said.

headline.seo: Man Held in Istanbul Death of Staten Island Tourist Sarai Sierra
headline.main: Turkish Authorities Detain Man in Death of Tourist From Staten Island
headline.print_headline: Turkish Authorities Detain Man Tied to the Killing of a Tourist From Staten Island
